content.5: And the curious girdle of his ephod, that
content.6: And they wrought onyx stones inclosed in ouches of gold, graven, as signets are graven, with the names of the children of Israel.
content.7: And he put them on the shoulders of the ephod,
content.9: It was foursquare; they made the breastplate double: a span
content.10: And they set in it four rows of stones:
content.11: And the second row, an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond.
content.12: And the third row, a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
content.13: And the fourth row, a beryl, an onyx, and a jasper:
content.15: And they made upon the breastplate chains at the ends,
content.17: And they put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings on the ends of the breastplate.
content.18: And the two ends of the two wreathen chains they fastened in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod, before it.
content.19: And they made two rings of gold, and put
content.21: And they did bind the breastplate by his rings unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, that it might be above the curious girdle of the ephod, and that the breastplate might not be loosed from the ephod; as the
content.22: And he made the robe of the ephod
content.24: And they made upon the hems of the robe pomegranates
content.26: A bell and a pomegranate, a bell and a pomegranate, round about the hem of the robe to minister
content.30: And they made the plate of the holy crown
content.31: And they tied unto it a lace of blue, to fasten
content.32: Thus was all the work of the tabernacle of the tent of the congregation finished: and the children of Israel did according to all that the
content.33: And they brought the tabernacle unto Moses, the tent, and all his furniture, his taches, his boards, his bars, and his pillars, and his sockets,
content.34: And the covering of rams’ skins dyed red, and the covering of badgers’ skins, and the vail of the covering,
content.35: The ark of the testimony, and the staves thereof, and the mercy seat,
content.38: And the golden altar, and the anointing oil, and the sweet incense, and the hanging for the tabernacle door,
content.39: The brasen altar, and his grate of brass, his staves, and all his vessels, the laver and his foot,
content.40: The hangings of the court, his pillars, and his sockets, and the hanging for the court gate, his cords, and his pins, and all the vessels of the service of the tabernacle, for the tent of the congregation,
content.41: The cloths of service to do service in the holy
